mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO metoo_route_table (time, deviceIp, destnetwork, mask, interface,port, nexthop, cost,preference, type) VALUES
( #{route.time}, #{route.deviceIp}, #{route.destnetwork}, #{route.mask}, #{route.interfaceName}, #{route.port}, #{route.nexthop}, #{route.cost}, #{route.preference}, #{route.type} )
